Activate recording Add Add connection Name for this entry Add new recording Save directory of the recording Add reminder The title of the recording Airing All channels TVHClient Available Wrong username or password Cancel Cancel adding a new recording? All values will be lost. Cancel editing existing recording? All values will be lost. Do you really want to remove the scheduled recording \'%s\'? Cast Channel Channels Clear Clear channel icon cache? Channel icon cache cleared Are you sure you want to remove all channel icons? You need to reconnect to the server to load the updated icons. Clear search history? Search history cleared Are you sure you want to remove all entries from the search history? Comment Completed recordings Discard connection values? All changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to remove all recordings? Connected to server Connecting to server… Connection Connection closed Connection failed Content type Current time Currently recording Data errors: %1$s File size: %1$d %2$s Days of week Delete Do you really want to remove the connection \'%s\'? Description Details Connect Restart Connection settings have changed. The application will be restarted and a new initial sync will be performed. No active connection is defined. The existing connection to the server will be closed. All additional features are already available! Unfortunately the purchase could not be completed, please contact the developer. The application will now be restarted to enable all features. The application will be restarted and a new initial sync will be done. Clear database contents? Connect to new server? Connect to new server? Disconnect from server? Thank you! Purchase not successful! Purchase successful! Reconnect to server? Directory Disc space Discard Download Error downloading the recording \'%s\'. Authentication not correct or missing. Error downloading the recording \'%s\'. Not sufficient space on the device. Detect duplicate shows Recording is a duplicate Duration Duration in minutes (0 = any) Recording profile Edit Edit connection Edit recording Activate times for recording Episode Recording was not added! %s The title must no be empty! Could not load program details Could not load recording details Please select a channel. You server version does not support recording on all channels. Recording was not removed! %s The start time must not be past the stop time. Error starting playback. No playback profile is selected in the settings. Recording was not updated! %s Extra start minutes (pre-time) Extra stop minutes (post-time) Could not connect to server. Is the IP address, hostname and port correct? Is a firewall not blocking the port? Error during connection attempt to server Failed to open socket to the server Failed recordings Failed to resolve server address This feature is not available in the free version! Your TVHeadend server does not support this feature. Please upgrade to newer version. Friday Full Changelog Explain genre colors List of genre colors and their meaning. Help and Support In 2 days Initializing Touch to cast Live TV or recordings to your TV. Please check that you meet the requirements described in the casting settings. This recording is part of a series recording This recording was created by a timer Loading data from server Loading data from server finished Finished loading more programs Maximum duration of the program Play on… Minimum duration of the program %d min Monday Name No cast session available At least one connection is defined, but not activated.
No connection available No program data available No media player found Not set Nothing Part Play Playback Advanced settings Cast playback profiles Select a profile that shall be used to cast a channel or recorded program to a chromecast or similar device. Casting Configure casting of programs or recordings to your TV. The server must have transcoding enabled. Changelog Show a list of features and changes of the different application versions. Clear database Removes all information from the database. This includes all channels, channel tags, programs and recordings. Clear channel icon cache Clear search history Connection timeout Defines the time in seconds until the connection with the server must be fully established. Increasing the value can improve the connectivity on slow networks. Connections Crash Reporting Settings Customize the user interface Choose from a variety of options to decide which information shall be shown in each screen. Date and time format Display the date and time as usually used in your country. Otherwise the format \'31.12.2017, 21:09\' is used. Debug Mode Write detailed information into a log file on the internal storage. Could slow down the app a bit if enabled. Startscreen Choose the screen that will be shown when the application starts. Download directory Recordings will be downloaded into the following directory: \'%s\' Send anonymous crash reports The reports contain the information that help to improve the stability and user experience of the application. Hours visible Number of hours of program data to be displayed on a screen for each sender. Too many hours affect readability. Maximum days to show Define the maxmimum number of days of program guide data that shall be shown. Sync duration of program data Amount of program guide data that shall be loaded from the server. General Genre colors Channels The genre color will be shown as a vertical line on the left side of the channel list screen. Program guide Shows the genre color in the background of each program guide item. Programs The genre color will be shown as a vertical line on the left side of the program lists and the program details screen. Specify on which screens the genre color shall be shown. Genre color visibility Set the visibility of the colors. Higher values mean stronger colors. Hide duplicate scheduled recordings Show the \'Delete all recordings\' menu Hostname or IP address www.server.com or 192.168.0.10 The IP-address is not valid. Enter the server hostname or IP address Playback profiles (Internal player) Select a profile that is used by the internal player to play a recorded program using the internal player. Playback profiles (External players) Select a profile that is used by an external player to play a recorded program using an external player. Information Show a list of used libraries and the people that contributed to the development. Language Choose the language that shall be used by the application. Manage connections Select your active connection to a TVHeadend server or add, edit or remove connections. Menu visibility Hide or show certain menu items. Miscellaneous Connection name The name must not be empty and may only contain letters, numbers, minus and underscore. Enter a unique name of the connection Navigation Navigation history Saves the history of the selected navigation menus. The Back button displays the previous navigation menu and its screen. When this setting is disabled, the app closes. Notifications Password Password is set but is not displayed. Enter password Channel icon action Start playing the current program or recording when the channel icon is selected in the channel list, program guide or recording list screen. Playback and recording HTSP Port The port number is not valid. Specify a number between 1 and 65535. Enter the server port Privacy Policy Profiles Define the profiles how content should be recorded or played. Program guide Configure the program guide screen and how the data shall be displayed. Recording profiles Select a profile that the server shall use to record a scheduled program. Default connection Select to make this the default connection and use it after the application has started. Send log to developer Mail the log file to the developer to support him improving the program. Only status information from TVHClient is sent! Cast controls Show a cast mini controller at the bottom of the screen to display some information about the current cast. Show channel name Additionally to the channel icon display the channel name above the program title in the channel list. Show channel number Display the channel number below the channel icon. Show next program in channel list The name of the program coming up next is displayed in the channel list. It is shown below the progress indicator. Notification time Define the time that a notification shall be shown in advance before the actual start of a recording. Show notifications Informs the user whenever a recording has started or has been completed. Show program artwork/poster
Displays the artwork/poster image to the current program. The server must provide the information. Show program subtitle Displays the subtitle to the current program Show progressbar Indicates in the channel list how much of the current program has already been shown. Show recording file status The file size and number of data errors of each recording will be shown in the recording lists. Channel Order Choose in which order the channels will be displayed. HTTP Port for media streaming Port %d will be used for media streaming. The default port is 9981 which is usually fine to use. Channel tag icon Show the icon for a channel tag. Light theme Use a light theme Additional features Enable access to additional features and support further development by buying the unlocked version of TVHClient. Username User interface Enter username Show the \'Channel Tags\' menu Try to show the channel tag menu in the action bar and not in the three dot menu. MAC address The MAC address is invalid.\nIt must have the pattern \'01:24:67:9a:cd:ef\'. Enter the MAC address of the host (e.g. 00:ef:aa:dc:09:45) Use Broadcast Send the WOL packet as a broadcast. Some routers do not allow this kind of WOL. Wake on LAN Port Port %d will be used to wake up the server. The default is 9. Priority Programs %1$d%% of the show already shown Purchase Rating Reconnect Cancel recording Record Record and Edit Record with different profile Remove recording Remove all recordings Record as series recording Stop recording Recording has been canceled This recording is disabled This recording is enabled Recording is invalid Recorded file is missing Recording Time Scheduled recording was missed Recordings Refresh Remove Do you really want to remove ALL recordings? Do you really want to remove the recording \'%s\'? Do you really want to remove the series recording \'%s\'? This will remove all scheduled recordings that are affected by this series recording rule. Do you really want to remove the timer recording \'%s\'? Removed recordings Requesting playback information from server Saturday Save Saving received data… Scheduled recordings Search Search the program guide Search on FileAffinity Search on Google Search on IMDb Search results Search on YouTube Season Select Select connection Select duplicate detection method Select recording profile Select log file Select priority Show programs that are running at the selected time. Wake up Series recordings Server Server API version Activate Deactivate Settings Do you want to go to the Google Play Store and search for available media players? Start End Start time Starting playback Status Stop Do you really want to stop the running recording \'%s\'? Stop time Stream errors: %1$s Subscription error: %1$s Subtitle Recording has been added. Recording has been removed. Recording has been updated. Summary Sunday Tags Thursday Time Time window to start recording Timeframe Timer recordings Title Today Tomorrow Total Tuesday Two days ago Unknown Wednesday The MAC-address is not valid. Please check your settings. Error sending wake on LAN packet to \'%1$s\'.\n Error message: %2$s Successfully sent wake on LAN packet to \'%s\' Successfully sent wake on LAN packet as a broadcast to \'%s\' Yesterday Search completed recordings Search scheduled recordings Search removed recordings Search failed recordings Search series recordings Search timer recordings Search programs Search program guide Multiple channel tags Select multiple channel tags Filter channels by selecting more than one channel tag Playback Choose how live TV programs or recordings are played. Play Live-TV with the internal player Play recordings with the internal player Buffer duration How many seconds to buffer before starting playback Buffer duration in seconds Enable Audio Passthrough You must also ensure the system audio settings allows passthrough Enable Audio Tunneling Enable support for DSP audio tunneling Enable timeshift support Copy playback Url to clipboard In case of playback issues the copied Url can be used to test playback in a browser. Disabled Enabled Enable random adaptation Receiving data Connect Disconnect Audio settings Subtitle settings Could not get the remote media client from the cast session. Please wait, player is loading more data… - Any Authentication failed Enable Disable Notify about running recordings Notify when server storage space runs low Server storage space threshold in GB Define the storage space threshold in gigabytes. If the available server storage space is below the threshold a notification will be shown Disk space is running low, \'%d\' GB remaining Network is not available >
